english.segment1: Great is Your faithfulness. Great is Your faithfulness. You never change. You never fail, O God
english.segment2: True are Your promises. True are Your promises. You never change. You never fail, O God
english.segment3: So we raise up holy hands. To praise the Holy One. Who was and is and is to come
english.segment4: Wide is Your love and grace. Wide is Your love and grace. You never change. You never fail, O God
english.segment5: You were, You are. You will always be
